attributes.action: recognise the lifetime achievements of Mr Len Silver, especially his contribution to the sport of Speedway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Len Silver has made an outstanding contribution to the sport of Speedway in the UK for over 55 years - as rider, promoter, team manager and owner.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
